posts.description:
I found this purple cauliflower at the market today (Olia @ps.ny 👀🙌🏻) and had to make something featuring it. You know...HAD TO🙈😂 #foodieproblems 
So here it is! 💜💚spring salad with fresh kohlrabi, arugula, blanched asparagus, my gorgeous purple cauli and avocado 🥑🌿 And what did you have for lunch today? 
Happy Tuesday my lovely peeps (and Wednesday to my Aussies😉)
Love, Maja xx

Love trumps hate🙌🏻 And is it "live and let live" 🤔? I think we're here to share our passion and find the kindred spirits to share our passion with. I never had that in real life and was kind of a weirdo with all that cooking and healthy stuff and "bird food" as some called it🙈😂 Not here though! Lot's of weirdos here😂😍 So I can finally say, I belong❤️ Sending love today to all my beautiful friends here and to this amazing community🙌🏻❤️ .
.

First local #strawberries 🍓I could just stuff myself🙈😂 Trying not to, though... Having seasonal produce is the best, for us and for the nature. I don't obey by this rule absolutely, but try to. Celebrating the #Earthday today thinking of the ways we as family could do more to contribute to preserving nature and its recourses. We have changed many things in recent years: we save water and power in our home having replaced all the faucets and lights with saving ones. We use reusable containers whenever possible, we reduce food waste by planning carefully and always finding use for leftovers, we recycle, bike and walk (or use public transport) instead of using our car... There is more but this caption is already too long🙈 I think there is so much more we could do, but as long as we all try and each make a small contribution, every small drop floods into a big river that helps our Mother Earth🙌🏻🌿🍃

This cake😍!! Epic!! Created by my sweet instasister Amy @amylecreations 🌷🍃❤️
#sharethelove 
Happy almost weekend guys!! (Working again the whole day but will catch up soon)
Sending love❤️ Maja xx

#cake #spring #homemade #vegancake

Been busy today...😅🙈 Won't say how busy but I made this Blueberry Vanilla Granola - made with frozen bluebs!...among several other things I cooked/baked/roasted/blended 🙌🏻🌿 You could say I missed my kitchen🤔😂 ((Btw. would you like the recipe?? And check out how I made it in my stories)) #Electrolux #makelifedelicious #homemade #baking #parfait

Rice paper rolls🌿 Something light and easy (needed after this weekend). I usually simply go what I have in the fridge (and I'm sure you have A LOT of leftovers 😂). Here I used tofu spread (fresh tofu, sesame seeds, shoyu, zataar, olive oil, ume seasoning, garlic - find the full recipe on my blog), avocado, cabbage, arugula, lettuce, spring onions and tahini sauce. Sprinkled with toasted sesame seeds and served with sweet chili sauce. How does that sound? I'm sure you can come up with something interesting too😉🙌🏻 Rice paper is one of staples I always have at home (same as soba and rice noodles, rice and quinoa, also cooked chickpeas in a jar - always something you can make using those, and in no time) 
Happy Tuesday wonderful people😘
Maja xx

Ps. big thanks to sweet Laura @a.healthy.nut for featuring my twin smoothies the other day💜💕 #ricerolls #homemade
Need some of these after the Easter weekend😅🙈🎂🍦🥗🌮🥙🍽?? Hope you had a great one, but now....#detox 💚🌿🍃💦!! ((Btw.recipe for these twins is #ontheblog))

And here's the recipe!! Matcha Coconut Spread made with @organicburst Matcha powder. Did you see me make it in stories? I need all the picking up these days (it's been really busy🙈)) and Matcha gives me that beautiful pick up and alertness without leaving me jittery as too much coffee does ((just too much!! not giving up on my walnut lattes either😆😂)) Did you know that Matcha increases Alpha waves in our brains by 75%?! Makes us super smart😜! Here's a simple recipe for this creamy deliciousness:

1/2 cup coconut butter
1 tbsp agave nectar 
2 tbsp coconut cream
1 tsp @organicburst Matcha powder
(Feel free to sweeten more and add more cream if you want it less thick🙌🏻)
Blend and enjoy!! Hope you're all having lovely weekend❤️ Happy Easter beautiful people 🐰🌷🙌🏻🌱💕
#homemade #spring #organicburst #sponsored

Which would you choose😃?? Happy #Easter bunnies🐰🐰🐰🌷💕🍃🌱 Hope you're all having lovely time with your fam bam❤️ ((and too much food 🙈😂🎂🍰🍦🍱🍽🍪🍩🥗🥙🥗)) #toasties #homemade #matcha #electrolux #makelifedelicious

Roasted sweet potato 🍠 😃!! Who's in?? This simple but soooo delicious salad is a total winner! Inspired by my wonderful Marisa @missmarzipancom that made an amazing one for our little foodie bunch on a meet up in Aarhus. 
#Ontheblog is my new post about sustainable living. I'm contributing in sustainability project by @ikeahrvatska and so proud of it. In this post I wrote about ways to save water in our homes. For the time being in Croatian but will write the whole thing in English as well. It's a promise!!
I'm off to work now 🙈 and will be back Monday night. Just imagine the size of my luggage!! I dare you😜😂😂!! Wishing you a Happy Easter guys🐰🥕🍃🌷 (pls send some virtual cakes and yummy food in mean time to yours truly🙈😃😜) Sending you love in return❤️
Maja xx
#homemade #salad #glutenfree #spring #sweetpotato #malepromjene #velikeustede
